effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 724,119.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 4.3 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
